title: Print, ""Moro Light: Fabrica de Tabacos" Cigar Label", ca. 1916
medium: Letterpress and lithograph, embossed on paper
provenance: Ellery Karl, OK Harris Gallery, 383 West Broadway, New York, NY
description: Label with grisaille portrait of FDR in red-bordered oval cartouche. It is flanked by golden tobacco leaves, metallic-gold coins and vine-like scrolls. Text, blue, top margin:"FRANKLIN D. ROOSEVELT."

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, ""Moro Light: Fabrica de Tabacos" Cigar Label", ca. 1916.
ca. 1916. Letterpress and lithograph, embossed on paper. Gift of Dr. Ellery Karl. 1975-74-1-16.
